author: wn.com
title: IFJ mourns death of first media worker killed in Burundi in 2015 (IFJ - International ...
text: ( Source : IFJ - International Federation of Journalists ) The International Federation of Journalists (IFJ) has today joined its affiliate, Union Burudaise des Journalistes, in condemning the outrageous killing of a cameraman and his family
